mapper.insert: INSERT INTO visit_schedule ( start_dt, end_dt, visit_status, rfid_start_time, rfid_end_time, is_log_written, beneficiary_id, care_worker_id, service_type_id, note ) SELECT TIMESTAMP(ds.d, bs.start_time) AS start_dt, TIMESTAMP(ds.d, bs.end_time) AS end_dt, 'SCHEDULED' AS visit_status, NULL AS rfid_start_time, NULL AS rfid_end_time, 0 AS is_log_written, bs.beneficiary_id AS beneficiary_id, am.care_worker_id AS care_worker_id, bs.service_type_id AS service_type_id, NULL AS note FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE date_seq AS ( SELECT #{startDate} AS d UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(d, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM date_seq WHERE d < #{endDate} ) SELECT d FROM date_seq ) ds JOIN beneficiary_schedule bs ON (CASE WHEN bs.day = 7 THEN 1 ELSE bs.day + 1 END) = DAYOFWEEK(ds.d) JOIN ( SELECT beneficiary_id, care_worker_id FROM ( SELECT m.beneficiary_id, m.care_worker_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.beneficiary_id ORDER BY m.id DESC) AS rn FROM matching m WHERE m.status = 'Y' AND (m.start_date IS NULL OR m.start_date <= #{endDate}) AND (m.end_date IS NULL OR m.end_date >= #{startDate}) ) t WHERE rn = 1 ) am ON am.beneficiary_id = bs.beneficiary_id WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM visit_schedule vs WHERE vs.beneficiary_id = bs.beneficiary_id AND vs.service_type_id = bs.service_type_id AND vs.start_dt = TIMESTAMP(ds.d, bs.start_time) );
